inclusion.criterion: Suspicion of acute appendicitis and planned for diagnostic laparoscopy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cannot understand, read or speak Danish
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other intra-abdominal pathology than appendicitis requiring other surgical intervention or treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. He has been diagnosed with acute perforated appendicitis and is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
